Title: Fallout
Plot: The fallout from the nuclear blast in Denver will hit Jericho in an hour and Jake has to get the residents inside.  The official shelter is not adequate and Jake must find another shelter to protect them. Emily faces troubles of her own while being picked up by who she thinks are two officers.
GuestStars: Musashi Alexander, Julia M. Flint, Chris Foreman, Geffri Maya Hightower, Todd Giebenhain, Jeff De Serrano, Aaron Hendry, Jonno Roberts
